tool_description: Generate Email, Phone Numbers, Credit Card, postal address and more. All the data generated are very random and doesn't represent any real life person or a company.
title: Fake Identity Generation

api_list.name: /identity/company
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fake-identity-generation.p.rapidapi.com/identity/company"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fake-identity-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /identity/person/name/last

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: No of names to return. Defaults to 1.

api_list.name: /identity/person/name

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: No of names to return. Defaults to 1.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Gender of the names. If not specified both gender names will be returned.

api_list.name: /identity/person/name/first
api_list.description: Generate first name (in a given gender)

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Gender of the names. If not specified both gender names will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: No of names to return. Defaults to 1.

api_list.name: /identity/person/creditcard
api_list.description: Generate credit card details (number, type, expiration date, name on the card etc).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: No of credit card details to return. Defaults to 1.
